title: Works very well
author: Marc Nowlin
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2025
review_text:
Pros:
Works amazingly. Used to mount dashcam on dashboard. Has not come loose like every other 3m I've used.

Cons:
I found that once I placed it on the mount for my dashcam (without the dashcam mounted) and then stick to the dashboard it felt loose at first. Bbuuttttttt after 24 hours, slid solid as a rock. I'd attach it, place something heavy on it for a couple hours, and then attach whatever.

title: Not Worth It — Don’t Be Fooled by the Hype
author: Posh Mom
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2025
review_text:
I was looking for a reliable mount to use in a classroom project involving papers, and after reading all the amazing reviews, I decided to give this a try. Unfortunately, it was a huge letdown. It couldn’t even hold something as light as toilet paper together — I can't imagine it supporting anything with real weight as listed for 15lbs. I was honestly embarrassed to have trusted the hype. While I usually trust this brand, the product quality here was extremely poor.

— I wouldn’t want it even if it were free.
product_title: Scotch Extreme Mounting Strips, Double-Sided Heavy Duty Tape, 8 Strips, 1 in x 3 in, Use Instead of Nails or Screws, Works on Painted surfaces, Metals, Acrylic, Hard Plastics and More (414H-ST)

title: This tape holds well

date: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2025
review_text: This item works well as I use it to hold up one flap of my doggie door. This helps my small dogs to go thru more easily.
product_title: Scotch Extreme Mounting Strips, Double-Sided Heavy Duty Tape, 8 Strips, 1 in x 3 in, Use Instead of Nails or Screws, Works on Painted surfaces, Metals, Acrylic, Hard Plastics and More (414H-ST)

title: Scotch Extreme Mount double sided mounting strips work Great!
author: Justin
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2025
review_text:
I’m really impressed with Scotch Mount Indoor Outdoor Extreme Tape Double-Sided Adhesive Strips! These strips are incredibly strong and have held up even in tough conditions. I used them to mount decorations both inside my home and on exterior surfaces, and everything stayed perfectly in place.

The adhesive is easy to apply, yet it’s strong enough to hold heavier items without sagging or falling. I also appreciate that it works on a variety of surfaces—metal, wood, and even textured walls. Plus, when I needed to remove a strip, it came off cleanly without damaging the surface, which is a huge bonus.

If you’re looking for a reliable double-sided tape that can handle both indoor and outdoor projects, this product is a must-have. It definitely exceeded my expectations!
product_title: Scotch Extreme Mounting Strips, Double-Sided Heavy Duty Tape, 8 Strips, 1 in x 3 in, Use Instead of Nails or Screws, Works on Painted surfaces, Metals, Acrylic, Hard Plastics and More (414H-ST)

title: Strong Hold and Easy to Install
author: DAWN
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2025
review_text: I used these to hang my ring doorbell, and it is really stuck on there, and hasn’t budged in months so far. It is strong and very adhesive. It is outside, taped to my door frame, and seems to be waterproof. I live in VA where it is very rainy in the spring and summer. It’s a thick and padded like tape, and it was very easy to use - I just stuck the tape on the back of the doorbell frame, pushed it hard a few times to ensure it stuck, and boom, it was installed. This tape saved me money because I did not have hire a handyman to install the doorbell frame or drill any holes in the side of my house. Great value.
product_title: Scotch Extreme Mounting Strips, Double-Sided Heavy Duty Tape, 8 Strips, 1 in x 3 in, Use Instead of Nails or Screws, Works on Painted surfaces, Metals, Acrylic, Hard Plastics and More (414H-ST)

title: Does it work? Yes!
author: Blu
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2025
review_text: This works well. I put a lightbox under my glass desk table so that I can draw on a fully flat surface. The 24inch lightbox hasn't fallen or slipped from beneath the desk once. I love this product because getting a desk with a light would've cost much more than this affordable setup. it truly does "mount". The cutting will be easier if you don't take the cover of the mount off until afterwards. I used an exacto blade to cut mine. I haven't tested it when it comes to water, but in terms of versatility this gets the job done.

title: Held Strong – Even on a Windy Day, No Damage, and One Pack Goes a Long Way!
author: Jenn Dentremont
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2025
review_text:
I used these Scotch Extreme Mounting Strips on both painted walls inside and the smooth siding outside my house to hang lightweight decorations, and they worked exactly as advertised.

Pros:
• Super Strong Hold: Everything stayed securely in place—even on a very windy day. Nothing slipped or fell.
• No Residue or Paint Damage: When I removed the indoor decorations later, the strips came off cleanly—no sticky mess or damage to the paint.
• Efficient and Flexible: I was able to cut the strips into smaller pieces and use just a little for each item. You don’t need a full strip for lightweight decor, which makes the pack go a long way.
• Used Them for Everything: I was able to hang every single decoration in my house using just one pack. Indoors and outdoors, these strips handled it all.
• No Tools, No Holes: A perfect solution if you want to avoid nails or screws.

Tips:
• Surface Prep Matters: Clean the area before applying to get the best hold.
• Use Enough (But Not Too Much): Even a small piece holds well, but for heavier items or outdoor use, a bit of extra support doesn’t hurt.

Final Thoughts:

These strips are super reliable, easy to work with, and surprisingly economical. They held strong, left no damage behind, and one pack was all I needed to decorate my entire home. I’ll absolutely be buying these again for future projects!
product_title: Scotch Extreme Mounting Strips, Double-Sided Heavy Duty Tape, 8 Strips, 1 in x 3 in, Use Instead of Nails or Screws, Works on Painted surfaces, Metals, Acrylic, Hard Plastics and More (414H-ST)

title: Do not buy.
author: Mziggysmalls
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2025
review_text: Does not hold 15 lbs.
product_title: Scotch Extreme Mounting Strips, Double-Sided Heavy Duty Tape, 8 Strips, 1 in x 3 in, Use Instead of Nails or Screws, Works on Painted surfaces, Metals, Acrylic, Hard Plastics and More (414H-ST)

title: Product quantity and performance not at par with cost
author: ExNYer72
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2025
review_text:
It depends largely on what you're using it for, but I found this particular style of tape by Scotch a bit on the disappointing side. I have previously been using another Scotch type double-sided tape with reasonable success and wanted to try this to see if it would be a better bond given the description and what I needed it for.

These strips are not a value for the money. In order for them to be effective you need to be generous with the number of strips you use for the project. Should you try to skimp, your project will be a failure. I found that I had to use twice as much tape than the previous style of tape I was using. The product description is the exact opposite. The red colored side of the tape is almost impossible to pull off. I will not buy this again nor do I recommend.
product_title: Scotch Extreme Mounting Strips, Double-Sided Heavy Duty Tape, 8 Strips, 1 in x 3 in, Use Instead of Nails or Screws, Works on Painted surfaces, Metals, Acrylic, Hard Plastics and More (414H-ST)

DOES NOT STICK TO VEHICLE DASH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I need just one or two strips and I thought this would be great. It is the size I need, but it does not stick to the dash of my truck like I was hoping it would. Yes, I cleaned the dash and placed it on a very lightly coarse trim peice. Not entirely smooth, but not rough either. It is typical dash plastic. The part I'm placing on the dash doesn't weight hardly anything (sensor) and it would've been great to replace what was there. It fell off almost instantly. What a pile of crap product this is. No recommendations for something else. I will buy something else and review that.

Out of frustration, I threw them out! I’ve been a very loyal Scotch foam square (indoor/outdoor, etc.) user; however, I will NOT purchase these again…nor should you😵‍💫
